trans-unit.source: Hurloon Minotaur
trans-unit.target: Hurloon Minotaur

trans-unit.source: The Minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.
trans-unit.target: The Minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

trans-unit.source: Serra Angel
trans-unit.target: Serra Angel

trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: Flying, vigilance

trans-unit.source: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.
trans-unit.target: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

trans-unit.source: Chaos Orb
trans-unit.target: Chaos Orb

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: If Chaos Orb is on the battlefield, flip Chaos Orb onto the battlefield from a height of at least one foot. If Chaos Orb turns over completely at least once during the flip, destroy all nontoken permanents it touches. Then destroy Chaos Orb.
trans-unit.target: {1}, {T}: If Chaos Orb is on the battlefield, flip Chaos Orb onto the battlefield from a height of at least one foot. If Chaos Orb turns over completely at least once during the flip, destroy all nontoken permanents it touches. Then destroy Chaos Orb.

trans-unit.source: Black Lotus
trans-unit.target: Black Lotus

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice Black Lotus: Add three mana of any one color.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice Black Lotus: Add three mana of any one color.

trans-unit.source: Juzám Djinn
trans-unit.target: Juzám Djinn

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzám Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzám Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

trans-unit.source: "Expect my visit when the darkness comes. The night I think is best for hiding all." —Ouallada
trans-unit.target: "Expect my visit when the darkness comes. The night I think is best for hiding all." —Ouallada

trans-unit.source: Jester's Cap
trans-unit.target: Jester's Cap

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

trans-unit.source: "Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses."\n—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist
trans-unit.target: "Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses."\n—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

trans-unit.source: Shivan Dragon
trans-unit.target: Shivan Dragon

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: While it's true most dragons are cruel, the Shivan dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.
trans-unit.target: While it's true most dragons are cruel, the Shivan dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

trans-unit.source: Incoming!
trans-unit.target: Incoming!

trans-unit.source: Each player searches their library for any number of artifact, creature, enchantment, and/or land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.
trans-unit.target: Each player searches their library for any number of artifact, creature, enchantment, and/or land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

trans-unit.source: Thorn Elemental
trans-unit.target: Thorn Elemental

trans-unit.source: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
trans-unit.target: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
